plugin.name: SetupChar
plugin.author: Bast
plugin.purpose: setup a character when first logging in

muclient.script:
internalrevision = "$Rev$"
dofile (GetPluginInfo (GetPluginID (), 20) .. "luapath.lua")
require "var" require "pluginhelper" require 'ldplugin'
function creategroup() if char and char.base then SendNoEcho('group create ' .. char.base.name .. "!") else phelper:mdebug('did not have char before creating group, trying again in 2 seconds') DoAfterSpecial(2, 'creategroup()', 12) end end

phelper:set_default('cmd', 'bsetup') phelper:set_default('plugin_colour', 'orange')
phelper:add_setting('dtrackskill', {help="the skill to set dtrack to upon login", type="string", default="", sortlev=20}) phelper:add_setting('creategroup', {help="create a group upon login (will be your character named followed by !)", type="bool", default="false", sortlev=20})
phelper:enable()
